Package de.gym.backend

Class UserProgress

java.lang.Object
de.gym.backend.UserProgress
public class UserProgress
extends java.lang.Object
The class represents the attributes used to described the progress made by a client in the gym. The user keep track of his progress and store his new weight into the database.
Author:
florina
